sen.j: 中村 東蔵（なかむら とうぞう）は、歌舞伎の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Tozo NAKAMURA was one of the professional name of Kabuki.
Tozo NAKAMURA is one of the professional names of Kabuki.
sen.cmt: was→is, name→names と修正しました。
sen.e: Tozo NAKAMURA is one of the professional names of Kabuki.
Tozo NAKAMURA the first
